transcript.text: hello ladies and gentlemen Jordan Sater
here on September 27th and the reason

right now is to invite you to the

that's happening this Saturday September
30th what's going on is that a bunch of
great minds are getting together to

knowledge to describe all of these
changes that we're seeing going on
through our cosmos right now all the
changes going on with our solar system
our Sun our earth and even you and I all

myself will be describing some science
regarding the Earth's magnetic pole
shifts that we're seeing the Schumann
